location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from the commander of the Eliza, Bushire to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: Numerous words on each line of the right hand side of the text have been obscured owing to insect damage, along with the name of the correspondent.

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting that the ship Elizawill be leaving tomorrow and requesting its port certificate as well as any dispatches the Resident may wish to send.
